file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-40-11-07 - EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE FORWARD FUSELAGE I (NLG AND ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENTS AND PRESSURE BULKHEAD-UPPER SIDE) - CLEANING/PAINTING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE FORWARD FUSELAGE I (NLG AND ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENTS AND PRESSURE BULKHEAD-UPPER SIDE) - CLEANING/PAINTING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to clean the EWIS components in the Forward Fuselage I (NLG & FWD Electronic Compartments, FWD Pressure Bulkhead - upper side). B. Zones: 113/114/213/214/215/216. C. Zone Boundaries ( AMM MPP 06-41-00/100 AMM MPP 06-41-00/100). D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE FORWARD FUSELAGE I (NLG & FWD ELECTRONIC ALL 05-40-11-100-801-A ♦ COMPARTMENTS FWD PRESSURE BULKHEAD - UPPER SIDE) - CLEANING EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-40-11 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-40-11-100-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE FORWARD FUSELAGE I (NLG & FWD ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENTS FWD PRESSURE BULKHEAD - UPPER SIDE) - CLEANING A. General (1) This procedure obeys the EWIS ICA requirement. (2) This task gives the instructions to do SMRD Task Number: 20-00-00-140-009-A00. (3) You must clean the EWIS components and adjacent area, at Forward Fuselage I, zones 113/114/213/214/215/216. (4) Do not unlace or displace the electrical wiring and components during the cleaning procedure. (5) Do not disconnect the electrical connectors during cleaning procedures. If contamination is found, clean only the exposed areas. (6) Refer to the preparation subtask for access panel information. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200 EMDP AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200 LG SAFETY PIN - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL SB145-32-0036 - WM 20-21-00 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 113 Forward fuselage I - LH 114 Forward fuselage I - RH 213 Electronic compartment - LH upper side 214 Electronic compartment - RH upper side Pressure bulkhead - electronic comp - 215 LH upper side Pressure bulkhead - electronic comp - 216 RH upper side EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 05-40-11 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Vacuum cleaner To clean the area E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Cloth, Lint-Free To clean the area AR available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward fuselage I I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Identify and open access doors and panels 113AZ, 113BZ, 113CZ, 114AZ and 114BZ of forward fuselage I, at sub-zone 110 (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100) that give access to zones 113/114/213/214/215/216. (2) Make sure that the nose landing-gear-safety pin ( AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/ 200) is installed. (3) On aircraft PRE-MOD SB145-32-0036, make sure that the pressure in hydraulic system 1 is fully released ( AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200). (4) On aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, install the safety pin of the NLG door solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). J. EWIS Components in the Forward Fuselage I (NLG & FWD Electronic Compartments, FWD Pressure Bulkhead - upper side) - Cleaning (Figure 701) SUBTASK 160-002-A (1) The cleaning procedure of this task is applicable to the specified components or assemblies of an area/zone. (2) Do the cleaning procedure as follows: (a) Use a vacuum cleaner and/or clean and dry cloth to remove the particles from the Forward Fuselage I (NLG & FWD Electronic Compartments, FWD Pressure Bulkhead upper side). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 05-40-11 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (b) If contamination is found, clean the EWIS components and adjacent area. Refer to WM 20-21-00, Section Cleaning Procedures. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close access doors and panels 113AZ, 113BZ, 113CZ, 114AZ and 114BZ of forward fuselage I, at sub-zone 110 (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100) that give access to zones 113/114/213/214/215/216 . (2) On aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, remove the safety pin of the NLG door solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 05-40-11 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
